title: WTF IS MAESTRO AND WHY AM I CONSTANTLY CRASHING!!!???
body:
ok so whenever I try to play league I have to restart my computer now
and I crash before I enter any game and im afraid I might get a leavebuster because now I crashed and now im having maestro errors?
WHAT THE FUCK IS MAESTRO!?!?!?!
I have never heard of maestro signed up for maestro and apparently league requires it now???
riot I don't know what you did but apperantly I need to restart my computer to play now and this sometimes happens even after I restart so I have to do it again

hi me from 33 minutes in the future i have a leavebuster for 5 games due to crashing riot please fix this bug and remove this failbuster
this is stupid riot please fix this...

replies.body:
*Maestro* is the service that tracks where you are in the client and helps sync your connection to the servers and the PvP.net service. Issues with maintaining a connection to it are often caused by certain network configurations that conflict with League. I suggest checking out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
